page.title: 01RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: The rural nature of the area makes it a very popular venue for country walks along nature trails and Forestry Commission pathways,{fishing}along the River Fowey and {shooting}on the fringe of the moorland. More organised team activities are also catered for. In the grounds of the Lanhydrock Estate there is a beautiful {cricket} ground, where the game has been played for over one hundred years. A short distance away, Bodmin {Rugby} Club have utilised a flat area of land, levelled off during the building of the Bodmin Bypass in 1976, to provide playing and social areas for their teams.
